attributes.action: Students should be allowed to Dye their hair whatever colour, even at school.
attributes.background: Students still have a life and should be allowed to live it and just because they go to school doesn't mean that should effect the way they express themselves.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition as the UK Government/Parliament are not responsible for the issue you raise. Your school would be responsible for deciding on dress codes. 

You might like to sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/234997
